title: And the Sea Will Tell (1991 - USA) true crime drama
description:
And the Sea Will Tell (1991 - USA)

Crime / Drama

starring . . . . Richard Crenna, Rachel Ward, Hart Bochner, James Brolin
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0101345/


Filmed at:
Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada
San Francisco, California, USA
Honolulu, O'ahu, Hawaii, USA
Huahine, French Polynesia

And the Sea Will Tell is a riveting true story packed with adventure, mystery and romance - and one that will have you spinning when you remember that it's all true! It is a story that could have been the backbone for a classic novel by Herman Melville or Joseph Conrad. Two couples, one wealthy and married, the other an ex-con and his hippie girlfriend, separately set sail for a remote South Pacific island, each hoping to play "Adam and Eve" in paradise. Upon lovely Palmyra Island two couples do arrive, but in 3 months time only one will leave alive.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 640x480, 25.000 fps, 1050 Kbps, 02h44m32s
Audio: Vorbis, 48000 Hz, stereo

TVRip, corner watermark, English audio, no subtitles
